scripts.test: nyc mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,reportName=odata-v4-server,reportTitle="OData V4 Server" src/test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:http: nyc mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,reportName=odata-v4-server,reportTitle="OData V4 Server" src/test/**/http.spec.ts
scripts.test:execute: nyc mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,reportName=odata-v4-server,reportTitle="OData V4 Server" src/test/**/execute.spec.ts
scripts.test:stream: nyc mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,reportName=odata-v4-server,reportTitle="OData V4 Server" src/test/**/stream.spec.ts
scripts.test:metadata: nyc mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,reportName=odata-v4-server,reportTitle="OData V4 Server" src/test/**/metadata.spec.ts
scripts.test:validator: nyc mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,reportName=odata-v4-server,reportTitle="OData V4 Server" src/test/**/validator.spec.ts
scripts.test:projection: nyc mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,reportName=odata-v4-server,reportTitle="OData V4 Server" src/test/**/projection.spec.ts
scripts.typedoc: rimraf docs && typedoc --name "JayStack OData v4 Server" --exclude "**/?(utils|index).ts" --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --hideGenerator --excludePrivate --out docs src/lib
